thread.title: Firefighter who pulled Southwest victim back into plane "felt a calling"

title: Firefighter who pulled Southwest victim back into plane "felt a calling"
text:
Firefighter who pulled Southwest victim back into plane "felt a calling" 12:23pm EDT - 01:22 
Andrew Needum, the Texas firefighter who pulled the victim of Tuesday's Southwest Airlines mid-air engine explosion back into the plane says he's ''no different than any other firefighter in this country.'' Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Andrew Needum, the Texas firefighter who pulled the victim of Tuesday's Southwest Airlines mid-air engine explosion back into the plane says he's "no different than any other firefighter in this country."
